name: Gamble Your Life Away
description:
Bet your hearts on challenges, complete the challenge to win back your chips and then some, perhaps you'll win some upgrades too. If you fail the challenge however, all the chips you bet will be lost.
keep above 0 chips to stay alive and see how many rooms you can clear.

- Controls - 

WASD to move, 
Mouse to aim, 
Left mouse button to shoot/Select cards
